question: Please provide all opinion pieces and featured articles from volume 01.
sql_query1:
SELECT Article.title 
FROM Article
WHERE (Article.news_content_type = "Opinion Piece" OR Article.news_content_type = "Feature Article") AND Article.volume = "01"
sql_query2:
SELECT Article.title 
FROM Article
WHERE Article.news_content_type = "Opinion Piece" OR Article.news_content_type = "Feature Article" AND Article.volume = "01"
interpretation1: Please provide both opinion pieces and featured articles where either was included in volume 01.
interpretation2: Show all the opinion pieces, also show just the featured articles from volume 01.
